faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MenuCraft

q1.question: What is MenuCraft?
q1.answer: MenuCraft is a professional menu builder designed specifically for restaurants, cafes, and food service businesses. Create beautiful, digital menus that your customers can access instantly on their phones. No design skills required - choose from our professional templates and customize to match your brand.

q2.question: How quickly can I create a menu?
q2.answer: You can create a professional menu in under 5 minutes! Simply choose a template, add your menu items, set your prices, and you're ready to go. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to organize categories, descriptions, and pricing all in one place.

q3.question: Can customers access my menu offline?
q3.answer: Yes! When you generate a shareable link, customers can save your menu to their home screen for instant offline access. This is perfect for areas with poor internet connectivity or for customers who want quick access to your menu without using data.

q4.question: Is my data secure?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and secure servers to protect your menu data. Only you and authorized staff can access and modify your menus. Regular backups ensure your information is never lost.

q5.question: Can I manage multiple restaurants?
q5.answer: Yes! MenuCraft supports multiple restaurant locations under one account. Each location can have its own unique menu, branding, and shareable link. Perfect for restaurant groups or franchises.

about.title: About MenuCraft
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to help restaurants, cafes, and food businesses create stunning, professional menus that captivate customers and drive sales.
about.storySubtitle: From a simple idea to a comprehensive menu design platform
about.storyParagraph1: MenuCraft was born from a simple observation: many restaurants struggle with creating professional, attractive menus that reflect their brand identity. Traditional design tools are expensive and complicated, while basic templates lack the flexibility and creativity that modern restaurants need.
about.storyParagraph2: Our team of designers, developers, and food industry experts came together to create a solution that combines the power of professional design tools with the simplicity of modern web applications. The result? MenuCraft - your complete menu design solution.
about.storyParagraph3: Today, we're proud to help thousands of restaurants worldwide create beautiful menus that not only look great but also help increase customer engagement and boost sales.
about.whyChooseSubtitle: Powerful features designed to make menu creation effortless
about.professionalTemplatesDesc: Choose from 25+ professionally designed templates crafted for different cuisines and restaurant styles, from fine dining to casual cafes.
about.lightningFastDesc: Create stunning menus in minutes, not hours. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to design, customize, and publish your menu instantly.
about.mobileOptimizedDesc: Your menus look perfect on any device. Share them via QR codes, social media, or embed them on your website.
about.ourValuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.customerFirstDesc: Your success is our success. We listen to feedback and continuously improve based on your needs.
about.qualityDrivenDesc: We maintain the highest standards in design, functionality, and customer support.
about.passionForFoodDesc: We love food and understand the restaurant industry. Our tools are built by food lovers, for food lovers.
about.globalImpactDesc: We're helping restaurants worldwide succeed in the digital age with beautiful, effective menu designs.
about.readyToTransformSubtitle: Join thousands of restaurants that trust MenuCraft for their menu design needs

contribute.reportBugsDesc: Found a bug? Report it with detailed information to help us fix it faster.
contribute.featureRequestsDesc: Have an idea for a new feature? We'd love to hear your suggestions.
contribute.documentationDesc: Help improve our documentation, tutorials, and user guides.
contribute.communitySupportDesc: Help other users, answer questions, and share your knowledge.
contribute.spreadTheWordDesc: Star our repository, share MenuCraft, and help us reach more users.
contribute.developmentSetupSubtitle: Join our 89 contributors building the future of restaurant menus
